# The `SDNode` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Represents one node in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag">SelectionDAG</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::SDNode</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Represents one node in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag">SelectionDAG</a>.

### hasAnyUseOfValue() {#ab6ea142f5ae930a660fbb4105ef42a98}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool SDNode::hasAnyUseOfValue (unsigned Value) const">
Return true if there are any use of the indicated value.

Unique and persistent id per <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> in the DAG.

Used for debug printing. We do not place that under <code>#if LLVM&#95;ENABLE&#95;ABI&#95;BREAKING&#95;CHECKS</code> intentionally because it adds unneeded complexity without noticeable benefits (see discussion with @thakis in D120714). Currently, there are two padding bytes after this field.

### hasPredecessorHelper() {#a7c6beebf86835d6582b0550cd7731ee9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool llvm::SDNode::hasPredecessorHelper (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42; N, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; Visited, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; Worklist, unsigned int MaxSteps=0, bool TopologicalPrune=false)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
Returns true if N is a predecessor of any node in Worklist.

This helper keeps Visited and Worklist sets externally to allow unions searches to be performed in parallel, caching of results across queries and incremental addition to Worklist. Stops early if N is found but will resume. Remember to clear Visited and Worklists if DAG changes. MaxSteps gives a maximum number of nodes to visit before giving up. The TopologicalPrune flag signals that positive NodeIds are topologically ordered (Operands have strictly smaller node id) and search can be pruned leveraging this.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h/#l00914">914</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h">SelectionDAGNodes.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
